synopsis.text: Six years into the new life of Inglis, once a revered king and divine knight, now a young girl born into a noble lineage, a startling revelation emerges: she is Runeless, incapable of wielding the magic runes prevalent in this era. Yet, undeterred by this seemingly insurmountable obstacle, Inglis remains resolute in her pursuit of mastering the blade and becoming a formidable warrior. Embracing her newfound identity and the challenges that come with it, Inglis seizes the opportunity to serve as a squire to her cousin, Rafinha Bilford, wholeheartedly dedicating herself to honing her combat skills. As she embarks on this journey, Inglis' unwavering ambition and unyielding spirit may just pave the way for her to become an extraordinary squire in this world both familiar and strange.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
